description:
Having saved a second life and revealed herself to Ryouta as a "Witch" (a description that Ryouta does not think to be very accurate), Kuroha considers her job done and doesn`t return to school. She feels that any further contact with her will put Ryouta in further danger.
Ryouta`s teacher sends him to deliver printouts to the absent Kuroha, but there is no house at the provided address. Ryouta tracks down Kuroha`s hideout, and discovers quite a bit more than he`d expected. Kuroha returns to school, and another life hangs in the balance.
Meanwhile, a sinister military group has captured a witch and her human friend, with dire consequences.
